title: Substitute Expression for $$y$$
text: Since the first expression is already in terms of $$y$$, substitute the expression into the first equation to solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, factor the expression and apply the zero product property.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: To solve for $$y$$, substitute each value for $$y$$ into the first equation of $$y=3x-5$$ to solve for $$y$$.
